Vacant $50m property in central Auckland vandalised as former owners look for a new home for the disabled https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/vacant-50m-property-in-central-auckland-vandalized-as-former-owners-look-for-a-new-home-for-the-disabled/ N5F4DMCNIJCRETXQVCON5X76U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/vacant-50m-property-in-central-auckland-vandalized-as-former-owners-look-for-a-new-home-for-the-disabled/ N5F4DMCNIJCRETXQVCON5X76U/ Isaac DavisonThe new board at Laura Fergusson Trust is now looking for a new facility in Auckland.
